data.name: SoundtRec Action Musical Cues
data.detailed_description:
The StR Action music pack is a collection of 30 epic musical cues you can use to maximize the impact of your games. The exciting, heavy rock/metal influenced songs will get your heart pumping like no other! Produced by SoundtRec Boston and its incredible, multi-talented composer team, the StR Action is a variable musical item in intensifying your battle scenes.

This pack contains:
30 musical cues, produced by using various high-quality, industry-standard sample libraries and real instruments, which are royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG/IG Maker projects. This can be used in SONAR Steam Edition or any compatible digital audio workstation with support for Wave files.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7, Win 8, Win 8.1 or Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x800 (1920 x 1080 recommended)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ASIO compatible hardware is recommended
  • Additional Notes: Connection required for downloads

data.legal_notice:
*Cakewalk Loop Manager is designed and tested to be compatible with STEAM installations of Music Creator and SONAR. Other SONAR or Music Creator configurations/installations are not officially supported.
**Cakewalk Loop Manager should be installed to the same STEAM Library that you have Music Creator and/or SONAR installed to for proper operation.
***Cakewalk Loop Manager does not need Music Creator or SONAR installed to be utilized.
